

Date of value for currency conversions.(yyyy-mm-dd)
<code xml>
<value value-date="2010-10-01">700000</value>
</code>
The ISO 4217 code for the currency in which the project is denominated. [only if different to default currency]
<code xml>
<value currency="GBP" value-date="2010-10-01">700000</value>
</code>
The total budget for the specified period in the specified currency. (Positive integer.
<code xml>
<value value-date="2010-10-01">700000</value>
</code>
